      Subclasses of Connection in test.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.mock 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MockConnection
      Class to be implemented during testing to try and make the test classes easier to read Provides an internal buffer of packets sent via sendPacket(byte[])
      class  ScriptedMockConnection
      A specific implementation of a MockConnection which has a different number of responses which will be returned using receive, or not at all in the case that willReadBlock returns true When a response is read i.e receiveNextPacket() is called, the response number is incremented by 1
